response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value proposition. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
